title: After Dark featuring "Tarsila do Amaral: Inventing Modern Art in Brazil"
short_description:
SOLD OUT
Presented by the Evening Associates
list_description:
SOLD OUT
Presented by the Evening Associates
description:
THIS EVENT IS SOLD OUT!

We have an extremely limited number of tickets on hold if you are interested in joining as an Evening Associate member. Please call (312) 499-4111 to join and receive a free ticket to this event and a discount to future events. Offer is only valid if you call to join the Evening Associates.

For the final After Dark of 2017, we’re thrilled to feature Tarsila do Amaral: Inventing Modern Art in Brazil. Along with late-night access to the exhibition, you’ll enjoy live performances by Twinsmith and Audio Jack, who appears in partnership with Slo'Mo, to keep you dancing all night. Try complimentary snacks throughout the evening, and a cash bar featuring a signature cocktail. Attendees must be 21+, and valid ID is required upon entry.

This event is hosted by the Evening Associates. Please use the Modern Wing entrance at 159 East Monroe Street.

Follow the Evening Associates on Facebook for the latest news on After Dark and other events.

#AfterDarkChi @Artinstitueea
